title: Person Walking Facing Right

adjectives: Used to represent motion, activity, or independence.
verbs: Depicts the act of walking or moving forward.
nouns: A person walking toward the right.

description: A person walking toward the right, shown mid-step with a natural stride. Often represents walking, hiking, traveling, or progress.
apple_vendor_description: On Apple devices, the person walking facing right emoji depicts a human figure mid-stride, facing toward the right. The design shows fluid motion and balanced proportions, often used to symbolize going somewhere, progress, or an active lifestyle.
